title: Quarkus 3.2.8.Final released - Maintenance release
content: Today, we released Quarkus 3.2.8.Final, the eighth maintenance release of the 3.2 LTS release train.  This release fixes the following CVE:   * build env information disclosure via gradle plugin  It should be a safe upgrade for anyone already using a 3.2 release.  If you are not already using a 3.2 release, please refer to .   FULL CHANGELOG  You can get .   COME JOIN US  We value your feedback a lot so please report bugs, ask for improvements… Let’s build something great together!  If you are a Quarkus user or just curious, don’t be shy and join our welcoming community:   * provide feedback on ;   * craft some code and ;   * discuss with us on and on the ;   * ask your questions on .
